smartRouting.title: Smart Route Planning
smartRouting.description: Our AI-powered algorithms analyze multiple factors to find the optimal route for your journey, considering time, cost, and environmental impact.

realTime.title: Real-Time Updates
realTime.description: Stay informed with live transit updates, delays, and alternative routes. Never miss your connection again.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly Choices
ecoFriendly.description: Track your environmental impact and discover greener alternatives. Every journey counts towards a sustainable future.

multiModal.title: Multi-Modal Transport
multiModal.description: Seamlessly combine buses, trains, trams, ferries, and walking to create the perfect journey for your needs.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our platform with cutting-edge technology to deliver the best commute experience.

community.title: Community First
community.description: Your feedback shapes our product. We build features that truly matter to Norwegian commuters.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We're committed to reducing carbon emissions by making public transport more accessible and appealing.

mapAndDepartures.title: Map and Departures
mapAndDepartures.description: View departures from stops, or find scooters and city bikes on the map.

trainsInEurope.title: Trains in Europe
trainsInEurope.description: Get information about Interrail, train services in Europe and delays.

aboutEntur.title: About Entur
aboutEntur.description: Read about Entur, what we do and our journey planner.

notFound.heading: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.

filters.title: How do you prefer to travel?

cookies.message: This demo project uses cookies for testing purposes. You can choose which cookies you allow.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the website to function. Cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Remember your preferences like language and location.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our website anonymously.

intro.paragraph1: IMPORTANT: Reiseklar is a demonstration/testing project built for educational and portfolio purposes only. This is NOT a real commercial service. This cookie policy is provided as an example of GDPR-compliant cookie practices.
intro.paragraph2: Any cookies used during testing are for development purposes only. You can manage cookie preferences through the cookie consent dialog or your browser settings. This demonstrates best practices for user privacy control.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners. Cookies allow websites to recognize your device and store some information about your preferences or past actions.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.description: We use cookies for several reasons:

reasons.authentication: To keep you logged in and remember your authentication status
reasons.preferences: To remember your preferences, such as language selection and location settings
reasons.analytics: To understand how visitors use our website and improve our services
reasons.security: To help keep our website and your data secure

essential.title: Essential Cookies (No Consent Required)
essential.description: These cookies are strictly necessary for the website to function. They enable basic functions like page navigation, access to secure areas, and authentication. We do not need your consent to use these cookies as they are required for the service you requested. Storage period: Session or up to 1 year.

functional.title: Functional Cookies (Consent Required)
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your language preference, your saved routes, and your location settings. We only use these cookies with your explicit consent. Storage period: Up to 1 year.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Consent Required)
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. We use this data to improve our website and services. We only use these cookies with your explicit consent. Storage period: Up to 2 years.

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.description: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or delete certain cookies. Generally, you should be able to manage cookie settings from the 'preferences' or 'options' menu in your browser.
managingCookies.warning: Please note that if you choose to block cookies, some features of our website may not function properly, and you may not be able to access certain parts of our site.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.description: In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-party cookies to report usage statistics of our service and deliver relevant content. These third parties have their own privacy policies, and we do not have access to or control over these cookies.

changes.title: Changes to This Cookie Policy
changes.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please revisit this Cookie Policy regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies.

contact.title: Contact (Development Project)
contact.description: NOTE: This is a demo project. For questions about this demonstration:

notice.title: Important Notice - Demo Project
notice.description: This is a demonstration/testing project for educational and portfolio purposes. This is NOT a real commercial service. These terms are provided as an example of what a real service would require.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Welcome to Reiseklar. These Terms of Service would govern your use of our travel planning service if this were a real commercial application.
introduction.paragraph2: This document demonstrates best practices for terms of service documentation in compliance with Norwegian and EU regulations.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using this demo service, you acknowledge that this is a testing environment. If this were a real service, you would be agreeing to be bound by these terms and all applicable laws and regulations.

useOfService.title: Use of Service
useOfService.description: If this were a real service, users would agree to:

rules.age: Be at least 16 years of age or have parental consent
rules.accurate: Provide accurate and complete registration information
rules.security: Maintain the security of your account credentials
rules.lawful: Use the service only for lawful purposes
rules.noHarm: Not attempt to harm, disrupt, or interfere with the service

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.paragraph1: You may be required to create an account to access certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.
userAccounts.paragraph2: NOTE: This is a demo environment. Any accounts created are for testing purposes only and may be deleted at any time without notice.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph1: This is a demonstration project. All content, features, and functionality are owned by the developer and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.paragraph2: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works without express permission.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: This demo service may integrate with third-party APIs and services for demonstration purposes. The developer is not responsible for the availability, accuracy, or content of third-party services.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.important: Important: This is a demo project
disclaimer.description: This service is provided 'as is' and 'as available' for demonstration purposes only. If this were a real service, it would be provided without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. Use at your own risk.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: This is a demonstration project with no commercial purpose. The developer shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of this demo service, including but not limited to data loss, service interruptions, or any other issues.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: Since this is a testing environment, access may be terminated at any time without notice. If this were a real service, we would reserve the right to terminate or suspend accounts for violations of these terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: These terms may be updated at any time. If this were a real service, continued use after changes would constitute acceptance of the modified terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: If this were a real Norwegian service, these terms would be governed by Norwegian law, and disputes would be subject to the jurisdiction of Norwegian courts.

contact.title: Contact (Demo Project)
contact.description: For questions about this demonstration project:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: IMPORTANT: Reiseklar is a demonstration/testing project built for educational and portfolio purposes only. This is NOT a real commercial service and no actual company exists. This privacy policy is provided as an example of best practices for GDPR compliance.
introduction.paragraph2: If this were a real service, it would comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Norwegian Personal Data Act (Personopplysningsloven). Any data collected during testing is for development purposes only and will not be used for any other purpose.

dataController.title: Data Controller (Development/Testing Only)
dataController.description: NOTE: This is a development project. There is no registered company or formal data controller. This section is provided as an example of what a real service would require. For questions about this demo project, contact:

dataCollection.title: What Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect information that you provide to us directly and information that is automatically collected when you use our service:

account.title: Account Information
account.description: When you create an account, we collect:

travel.title: Travel Information
travel.description: When you use our service, we collect:

items.usage: Usage data and interaction with our service

howWeUseData.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseData.description: We use your personal information for the following purposes:

purposes.provideServices: To provide and maintain our travel planning service
purposes.personalizeExperience: To personalize your experience and remember your preferences
purposes.improveServices: To improve and develop our services based on usage patterns
purposes.communication: To communicate with you about service updates and important information
purposes.security: To ensure the security and integrity of our service
purposes.legal: To comply with legal obligations and resolve disputes

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.description: Under GDPR, we process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

bases.consent: Consent: When you give us explicit consent (e.g., for analytics cookies)
bases.contract: Contract: When processing is necessary to provide the service you requested
bases.legitimate: Legitimate interests: For improving our service and ensuring security
bases.legal: Legal obligation: When required by law

dataSharing.title: How We Share Your Information
dataSharing.description: We may share your information with:

parties.serviceProviders: Service providers who help us operate our platform (e.g., hosting, analytics)
parties.transitProviders: Public transit providers to access real-time schedule and route information
parties.legal: Legal authorities when required by law or to protect our rights

dataSharing.noSelling: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy:

periods.account: Account data: Until you request account deletion
periods.travel: Travel history: Up to 2 years from your last activity

yourRights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
yourRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: You can request a copy of your personal data

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: You can request correction of inaccurate data

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: You can request deletion of your data ('right to be forgotten')

restriction.title: Right to Restriction
restriction.description: You can request limitation of data processing

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: You can request your data in a machine-readable format

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: You can object to certain types of processing

complaint.title: Right to Complain
complaint.description: You can file a complaint with Datatilsynet (Norwegian Data Protection Authority)

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
security.measures: These measures include encryption, secure servers, access controls, and regular security assessments. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.description: Our service is not intended for children under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting a notice on our website or sending you an email. Your continued use of the service after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact (Development Project)
contact.description: DISCLAIMER: This is a testing/demo project. For inquiries about this development project:

datatilsynet.title: Note About Data Protection
datatilsynet.description: This is a demonstration project. If this were a real service, users could contact Datatilsynet (Norwegian Data Protection Authority) at

help.title: Help & Support
help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and learn how to use Reiseklar
help.demoNotice: NOTE: This is a demonstration project. The features described below show what a real travel planning service would offer.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.intro: Welcome to Reiseklar! Here's how to get started with our travel planning service:

steps.step1: Create an account or sign in with Google
steps.step2: Enter your starting location and destination
steps.step3: Choose your preferred travel options and filters
steps.step4: Save your favorite routes for quick access

searchingRoutes.title: Searching for Routes
searchingRoutes.description: Finding the perfect route is easy with Reiseklar:

enterLocations.title: Enter Your Locations
enterLocations.description: Type your starting point and destination. You can use addresses, landmarks, or select from recent searches.

viewResults.title: View Route Options
viewResults.description: We'll show you multiple route options with estimated times, transfers, and eco-friendly alternatives.

filters.title: Use Filters
filters.description: Filter results by public transport type, walking distance, or environmental impact to find your ideal route.

savingRoutes.title: Saving Your Favorite Routes
savingRoutes.description: Save routes you use frequently for quick access:

benefits.quick: Quick access to your daily commute
benefits.organize: Organize routes by purpose (work, home, leisure)
benefits.track: Track your travel history and environmental impact

create.title: Creating an Account
create.description: Sign up with your email or use Google authentication for quick access. An account lets you save routes, track history, and personalize your experience.

update.title: Updating Your Profile
update.description: Go to your profile page to update your name, email, preferences, and notification settings.

delete.title: Deleting Your Account
delete.description: You can delete your account at any time from your profile settings. NOTE: In this demo, accounts may be deleted without notice for testing purposes.

settings.title: Settings & Preferences
settings.description: Customize your experience in the settings page:

options.privacy: Control your privacy and data settings

noResults.title: No routes found?
noResults.solution: Try adjusting your search locations, check for typos, or broaden your search criteria. Make sure locations are in Norway.

loginIssues.title: Can't log in?
loginIssues.solution: Reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link. For Google sign-in issues, check your Google account permissions.

slowLoading.title: Slow loading times?
slowLoading.solution: This demo may experience delays due to API rate limits. Refresh the page or try again in a few moments.

contact.title: Still Need Help?
contact.description: If you couldn't find the answer you're looking for, feel free to contact us:
contact.noteDescription: This is a demo project. Response times may vary or support may not be available.

user.welcomeMessage: Here's your commute overview for today
user.planNewRouteDesc: Find the best route for your journey

deleteProfile.title: Do you want to delete the profile?
deleteProfile.description: Content that will be deleted includes tickets, payment cards, receipts and favorites. In cases where your profile is linked to an ongoing case, we will store certain information about you in addition to this.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Customize your preferences and account settings
settingsPage.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive trip updates and alerts via email
settingsPage.pushNotificationsDesc: Get real-time notifications on your device
settingsPage.twoFactorAuthDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account

admin.manageUsersDesc: Add, edit, or remove user accounts

usersPage.title: User Management
usersPage.description: Manage all users and their permissions

analyticsPage.title: Analytics
analyticsPage.description: View detailed platform analytics and insights

settingsPage.title: System Settings
settingsPage.maintenanceModeDesc: Put the site into maintenance mode
settingsPage.requireEmailVerificationDesc: Users must verify their email to access the platform
